procedureDescription:
<sml:SimpleProcess xmlns:sml="http://www.opengis.net/sensorml/2.0" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml/3.2" xmlns:swe="http://www.opengis.net/swe/2.0" gml:id="sp_D0416D48420C830EBA6DC6CA543476FED964CBEB">
  <gml:description>Instrument configuration - Nitrogen oxides as nitrogen dioxide</gml:description>
  <gml:identifier codeSpace="uniqueID">http://environment.data.gov.uk/air-quality/so/GB_StationProcess_1003</gml:identifier>
  <gml:name codeSpace="">1003 - Liverpool Speke-Nitrogen oxides (air)</gml:name>

  <sml:identification>

        </sml:Term>
      </sml:identifier>
      <sml:identifier>
        <sml:Term definition="urn:ogc:def:identifier:OGC:1.0:longname">

        </sml:Term>

    </sml:IdentifierList>

  <sml:capabilities name="offerings">

  <sml:inputs>

  <sml:outputs>

</sml:SimpleProcess>
